issue_name: No drip edge molding on roof.
issue_description: There is no drip edge molding at the edge of the roof, but the shingles overhang by 1 inch. The probability of leakage is low.
issue_summary: No drip edge molding on roof, low risk of leakage.
additional_information: The probability of leakage is low.
issue_images: Image of asphalt shingles on a roof with a snow cover.
Image of asphalt shingles on a roof with a snow cover and a visible gutter.

issue_name: Minor repointing needed on exterior brickwork.
issue_description: The corner of the brickwork at the garage door shows deterioration of the mortar.
issue_summary: Deterioration of mortar at the corner of the garage brickwork.

issue_name: Spindle not attached at bottom right handrail of deck.
issue_description: One vertical spindle is unattached at the bottom of the right railing of the deck. It needs to be screwed on.
Some horizontal cracking was seen on the porch deck at each end, as well as on the neighboring porch.
issue_summary: Horizontal cracking on the concrete porch.
issue_images: Image of a concrete porch with horizontal cracking.
Image of another section of the concrete porch.

issue_name: Balcony deck is too close to sliding door threshold.
issue_description: The deck of the balcony is almost at the same level as the sliding door threshold, which makes it likely for snow to enter if the door is used in the winter.
issue_summary: Balcony deck level is a potential source of snow entry.

issue_description: A minor dent was noted in the top of the garage door.
Some deterioration was noted on the garage door molding. It is recommended to fill/paint it in the spring, or cover it with aluminum trim.
issue_images: Image of the garage door molding.

issue_description: The combustion fan for the gas furnace is noisy, which may indicate that the bearing is failing. The report recommends servicing the furnace.
issue_summary: Combustion fan is noisy, may be end-of-life.
additional_information: Location: Furnace Room. Task: Service the furnace. Time: Immediate. Cost: Minor.

issue_name: Rust on heat shield of gas furnace.
issue_description: There is rust on the heat shield of the gas furnace, which is sometimes caused by backdrafting.
additional_information: Location: Furnace Room. Task: Service. Time: Immediate. Cost: Minor.
issue_images: Image showing rust on the heat shield.

issue_description: There is condensate leaking inside the furnace cabinet, which may be caused by a plugged condensate drain.
additional_information: Location: Furnace Room. Task: Service. Time: Immediate. Cost: Minor.

issue_description: The duct-mounted bypass humidifier is seeping and requires service/cleaning.
additional_information: Location: Furnace Room. Task: Service. Time: Immediate. Cost: Minor. Implication: Chance of water damage to contents, finishes and/or structure or damage to equipment.
issue_images: Image of the duct mounted bypass humidifier.
